text: Wansembe mmodzi atapeko dzanja limodzi la ufa wosalala wa nsembe yachakudya ija kuti ukhala ufa wachikumbutso ndi mafuta pamodzi ndi lubani yense amene ali pa nsembe ya chakudyacho, ndipo azitenthe pa guwa kuti zilandiridwe ndi Yehova m ºmalo mwa nsembe yonse kuti zikhale nsembe ya fungo lokomera Yehova.
